thread.title: Camberwellse5

author: Camberwellse5
title: Camberwellse5
text:
Ordered on line on Friday. Booked fitting for Saturday morning. Received immediate call to confirm details. Driver called on Saturday to confirm arrival time and fitted new tyre quickly and without fuss. Have used Kwik Fit in the past because forced to by company car policy but this was more convenient.
Local Kwik Fit it could not get me the matching tyre until Monday.
